# Copyright (c) 2015 by Cisco Systems, Inc.
# All rights reserved.
#
# April 2015,     R.A. Winters <riwinter@cisco.com>

# XxX.... or
# Xx<desc>X....
#
# desc is the string to label the match in the table
# x is literal and x is one of:
#
# A - address (ipv4 or ipv6)
# I - interface name
# F - floating point number
# H - hex number
# M - mac address
# N - number
# R - newline requires
# P - prefix address (ipv4 or ipv6)
# p - parenthesis - match value inside parens
# S - non-space
# T - time (00:0:00)
# W - word
#
# or XXX<regex>XXX... or
# or XXX<regex><desc>XXX...
#
# regex is a regular expression
# desc is the string to label the match in the table

OS: NXOS

CMD: SHOW_INTERFACE_COUNTERS_DETAIL
SHOWCMD: show interface counters detailed | no-more
PREFIX: intf-counters

ACTUAL:

# show interface counters detailed
Ethernet1/1/2
  Rx Packets:                                     1863853
  Rx Unicast Packets:                             1722941
  Rx Multicast Packets:                            139168
  Rx Broadcast Packets:                              1744
  Rx Jumbo Packets:                                  2897
  Rx Bytes:                                     144956277
  Rx Packets from 0 to 64 bytes:                  1685551
  Rx Packets from 65 to 127 bytes:                 122640
  Rx Packets from 128 to 255 bytes:                  9559
  Rx Packets from 256 to 511 bytes:                 25698
  Rx Packets from 512 to 1023 bytes:                16903
  Rx Packets from 1024 to 1518 bytes:                 605
  Tx Packets:                                    10506728
  Tx Unicast Packets:                              154365
  Tx Multicast Packets:                          10348783
  Tx Broadcast Packets:                              3580
  Tx Jumbo Packets:                                  6849
  Tx Bytes:                                     826630601
  Tx Packets from 0 to 64 bytes:                   158261
  Tx Packets from 65 to 127 bytes:               10115713
  Tx Packets from 128 to 255 bytes:                 37026
  Tx Packets from 256 to 511 bytes:                170703
  Tx Packets from 512 to 1023 bytes:                17327
  Tx Packets from 1024 to 1518 bytes:                 849

MARKUP:
XI<interface-name>XEthernet1/1/2
  Rx Packets:                                     XN<rx-total-pkts>X1863853
  Rx Unicast Packets:                             XN<rx-unicast-pkts>X1722941
  Rx Multicast Packets:                            XN<rx-multicast-pkts>X139168
  Rx Broadcast Packets:                              XN<rx-broadcast-pkts>X1744
  Rx Jumbo Packets:                                  XN<rx-jumbo-pkts>X2897
  Rx Bytes:                                     XN<rx-total-bytes>X144956277
  Rx Packets from 0 to 64 bytes:                  XN<rx-pkts-0-64-bytes>X1685551
  Rx Packets from 65 to 127 bytes:                 XN<rx-pkts-65-127-bytes>X122640
  Rx Packets from 128 to 255 bytes:                  XN<rx-pkts-128-255-bytes>XX9559
  Rx Packets from 256 to 511 bytes:                 XN<rx-pkts-256-511-bytes>X25698
  Rx Packets from 512 to 1023 bytes:                XN<rx-pkts-512-1023-bytes>X16903
  Rx Packets from 1024 to 1518 bytes:                 XN<rx-pkts-1024-1518>X605
  Tx Packets:                                    XN<tx-total-pkts>X10506728
  Tx Unicast Packets:                              XN<tx-unicast-pkts>X154365
  Tx Multicast Packets:                          XN<tx-multicast-pkts>X10348783
  Tx Broadcast Packets:                              XN<tx-broadcast-pkts>X3580
  Tx Jumbo Packets:                                  XN<tx-jumbo-pkts>X6849
  Tx Bytes:                                     XN<tx-total-bytes>X826630601
  Tx Packets from 0 to 64 bytes:                   XN<tx-pkts-0-64-bytes>X158261
  Tx Packets from 65 to 127 bytes:               XN<tx-pkts-65-127-bytes>X10115713
  Tx Packets from 128 to 255 bytes:                 XN<tx-pkts-128-255-bytes>X37026
  Tx Packets from 256 to 511 bytes:                XN<tx-pkts-256-511-bytes>X170703
  Tx Packets from 512 to 1023 bytes:                XN<tx-pkts-512-1023-bytes>X17327
  Tx Packets from 1024 to 1518 bytes:                 XN<tx-pkts-1024-1518-bytes>X849
